game.title: The Lost Sword of Light
game.objective: Retrieve the lost sword from the ancient ruins and bring it back to the village elder.
game.description: The village elder has asked for your help in retrieving a powerful sword that was lost during a previous expedition. The sword is said to be hidden deep within the ancient ruins, guarded by traps and fearsome creatures.

task.objective: Navigate the ancient ruins and find the entrance to the sword's chamber.
task.description: The entrance to the sword's chamber is hidden behind a secret door. You will need to use your wits to figure out how to open it.

task.objective: Solve the pressure plate puzzle to unlock the door to the sword's chamber.
task.description: The pressure plates are triggered by stepping on them in a specific sequence. You will need to observe the symbols etched into the walls and figure out the correct sequence.

task.objective: Retrieve the lost sword from its pedestal and bring it back to the village elder.
task.description: The sword is enchanted with magical properties that will aid you in your future endeavors. Be careful not to trigger any traps while retrieving the sword.
